name: Convert Your Friends!!
description:
Convert Your Friends is a two player game all about feeding your ‘friends’ to your lord and master Cthulhu.

The aim of the game is to push as many of the roaming NPC's into your pit as you can in the given time. You are also awarded extra points if your opponent ends up in your pit.

It was made by four game development students during a four week long game jam and currently features two levels: The Pit and Island Paradise.
